author: IANS
title: Coronavirus | President, V-P to donate a month’s salary to PM-CARES Fund
description: The President’s office through a Tweet announced the pledge taken by him amid the crisis, which has a direct impact on the government’s economy in the fight against the deadly disease.
content:
President Ram Nath Kovind on Sunday announced to contribute his one month salary to Prime Ministers relief fund to fight novel coronavirus crisis and also appealed to citizens to donate funds to defeat the pandemic.
